name: Hat'venture
description:
Would you throw yourself into a well if asked? No, of course not. Unless someone stole your hair. Travel through the underground world dodging obstacles and eliminating monsters that block your way. But beware, you're not the only one chasing your hair.

Travel deeper and deeper
You will travel through a randomly generated world in this roguelike shoot 'em up. Avoid all obstacles to go faster and faster through the depths. But be careful, depth means danger.

Hats
Retrieve hats during your trip. Now that you are bald, they will give you power. You want more ? Upgrade each hats while you have money !

Simple but challenging
You can jump, dodge or shoot. Simple ? Don't be fooled, it's not as easy as it looks.
